resources.string: You have paid for FUTO Keyboard
Your purchase will help continued development of FUTO Keyboard, and other FUTO projects.

This app only serves to let you pay for FUTO Keyboard through Google‘s payment system. You don’t need to keep this app installed. To get rid of the payment notice in FUTO Keyboard, tap ‘I already paid’ or the button below.
Download FUTO Keyboard from Play Store
